name: rabeqel
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(w0, wcel(c0, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(w0, wcel(c0, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), w0))

stmt.origin: elrab2(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0, w1)
stmt.pretty: elrab2(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
-| wceq(c1, crab(s0, c2, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(w0, wcel(c0, c2)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
-| wceq(c1, crab(s0, c2, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Class element of a restricted class abstraction. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 24-Jul-2021.)
